unnormalised: Crop insurance, eh? Necessary evil, I tell you! Heard many farmers in my village near Patna complaining. Premiums are high, payouts take ages. Last year, Ramlal lost his entire paddy crop due to floods, still waiting for his money! Diwali was tough for his family. Itna paperwork, bhai! Wish it was simpler, like getting biryani delivered! Maybe a kisan helpline like IRDAI for insurance? At least 100% crop protection is needed.
